languageKey.label: Categori Import
About the import module
About the import module

###ICON1### This module is used to import and update category data. This could e.g. come in handy if you would like to use the categories from a public taxonomy (such as the one provided by dmoz.org) instead of creating your own categories.
3rd party taxonomy vendors are invited to hook into this module.
###ICON2### There are currently no import functions installed.
Please select an import wizard from the above menu:
Select import wizard
Select wizard:
